Protocols/Server.html.name: Server
Protocols/Server.html.abstract: Server is used to create your custom servers.

Enums/ConverterError.html#/s:7pi_task14C.name: badInput
Enums/ConverterError.html#/s:7pi_task14C.abstract: There is no XML root in the input.

Enums/ConverterError.html#/s:7pi_task14C.name: elementNotFound
Enums/ConverterError.html#/s:7pi_task14C.abstract: There is no element in the node

Enums/ServerFactoryError.html.name: ServerFactoryError
Enums/ServerFactoryError.html.abstract: An error that can occur on ServerFactory.create(port: Int) method calling.

Enums/ConverterError.html.name: ConverterError
Enums/ConverterError.html.abstract: An error that can occur on XMLToYAMLConverter.convertToYAML(fromXML xml: String) method calling.

Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html#/s:7pi_t.name: init()
Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html#/s:7pi_t.abstract: There is no reason to create XMLToYAMLConverter instance directly.

Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html#/s:7pi_t.name: convertToYAML(fromXML:)
Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html#/s:7pi_t.abstract: Converts given XML string to YAML-formatted string.

Classes/ServerFactory.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: init()
Classes/ServerFactory.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: There is no reason to create ServerFactory instance directly.

Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: router
Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: Kitura.Router instance. Used to handle incomming HTTP requests.

Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: init(port:)
Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: This initializer does nothing but configure routes.

Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: start()
Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: Use it to start the server. You can use it directly after creating ServerDefault instance.

Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: stop()
Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: Use it to stop the server. Reasonable to call after ServerDefault.start().

Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.name: configureXMLAcceptRoute()
Classes/ServerDefault.html#/s:7pi_task13.abstract: Used to configure accept incomming POST on /convert requests with XML body.

Classes/ServerFactory.html.name: ServerFactory
Classes/ServerFactory.html.abstract: Class for returning implementation of Server protocol. Use it to build your server.

Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html.name: XMLToYAMLConverter
Classes/XMLToYAMLConverter.html.abstract: Class for building YAML-formatted string of given XML-formatted string.
